Description:
Living in an abundance of joy
This beautifully designed two-year-old Fairhaven open plan living home is positioned in the ever so popular growing Eliston Estate and is sure to impress.
This home features;
- Four spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite and remaining bedrooms with built in full mirrored robes.
- A large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ceaser stone bench tops, clear glass splash back with ample amount of cupboard space overlooks the family/ meals area with a separate front living room at the front of the house.
- Double car garage with internal, external and remote access.
Other features include, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, carpet in all bedrooms and front living room, LED downlights, security system with cameras, a low maintenance backyard and an 18-panel solar system, you'll be sure to keep the cost of living down. With local parks including sporting fields (Casey Fields), Casey Race, schools, public transport and shops all close by and to top it off the amazing Elm Park within 20 steps from the driveway.
Eliston Estate is planned with perfection with soon having its own major town centre with shops and cafes, a new primary school and childcare centre within an arm's reach.

Description:
Start Living Your Dream
Walk into this pristine Burbank built home intended to bring one lucky buyer the feeling of comfort and luxury. This immaculately maintained, neat and tidy one year young family home comes with a family friendly floorplan on generous 498sqm block in Hartleigh Estate. There is plenty of living space with a formal lounge to the front and then an expansive kitchen, meals and living area to the rear. The family meals then open up to a beautiful alfresco and BBQ area.
This sensational property comprises;
4 bedrooms, Master with full ensuite and walk-in robe
3 bedrooms with built in robes all serviced by a family bathroom
Central kitchen with high range appliances
Two living areas
Walk in pantry
Ducted heating
Evaporative cooling
Ducted Vacuuming
Downlights throughout the house
Gas line hooked up for BBQ area
Double remote garage with panel doors
Conveniently located close proximity to Clyde Shopping centre and Selandra Rise shopping centre .Moments from Casey Fields, quality schools, childcare centres and Casey RACE Aquatic and Leisure Centre.
Be quick to enquire not to miss this golden opportunity.
ONLY one thing left to do...

Description:
LIGHT & AIRY
CLYDE - This modern and fresh home is located perfectly in the Pasadena Estate. From the moment you pull into the driveway, you will be greeted by the cheerfully landscaped front yard.
The long Victorian-esque hallway is bright and leads straight down into the heart of the home, being the kitchen and living areas.
Featuring a separate study space, drenched in sunlight you are set with a delightful spot to attend to any work or study! A separate laundry with loads of storage and internal access to the garage is extremely convenient.
The kitchen is equipped with all the features you could ever need, including stainless steel, gas stovetop and electric oven, breakfast bar and storage aplenty.
The kitchen has a separate dining area, with ample space which overlooks the living room, for seamless open plan entertaining.
The decked entertainment area and landscaping sets this home apart from the others! Stepping outside to the pergola area you will be amazed by the urban oasis awaiting you. Private and sunny, the outdoor area is a happy place to sit and relax with friends and family, or perfect to take a moment to yourself.
Bimberry Circuit offers 2 generous sized bedrooms. Master has access to the main bathroom and large built in robe while the second bedroom also features a built in robe.
Features include:
- Ducted heating & Split system
- Quality tiles throughout
- Stainless steel appliances
- Decked entertainment area with pergola
- Landscaped gardens
- Study area
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area has easy access to multiple shopping centres; with the Shopping On Clyde Centre within walking distance to this home. There are a number of schools in the area including St. Peters College, St Thomas the Apostle, Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
SLEEK BOUTIQUE LIVING!
Situated in the highly renowned Pasadena estate sits this cosy boutique home complete with all the bells and whistles!
A top tier home in a top tier estate, the open floor plan boasts 3 bedrooms, the large master providing its own spacious walk-in robe.
The hostess kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including 600mm range hood, 4-burner gas cooktop, caesar stone bench tops and tiled splash back, not to mention the ample cupboard storage and bench space with a chic walk-in pantry! All of this overlooking your separate meal and living zones.
Not only is this home fitted out with top quality fixtures and fittings, it also offers a beautiful grassed backyard where you can choose to relax or kick a ball with the kids!
Additional extras include: internal access, ducted heating & split system cooling, down lights, neutral tones throughout, easy to maintain gardens plus much more!
While you take the time to appreciate the care and effort that has gone into making this residence the perfect family home you will notice the quality flows both internally and externally.
Here lies a terrific opportunity for those looking to buy real estate in an award-winning location - only a stone's throw away from the Shopping on Clyde Centre, which boasts a supermarket and cafÃ©'s, local kindergarten & schools and medical facilities, not to mention a park within walking distance and all the local amenities located in the township of Berwick.

Description:
Spacious Family Living
Century 21 Casey proudly presents this Beautiful Family House in the heart of Clyde Situated in a popular new estate. This home would be perfect for those looking to accommodate a growing family or investors.
Comprising of 4 double bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, 2 well-proportioned living areas including, formal lounge/rumpus plus a large open plan family meals room adjacent to a stunning galley style kitchen equipped with Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm s/s upright oven and dishwasher.
Further emphasising both ducted heating and evaporative cooling, porcelain tiles and high ceilings throughout, low maintenance rear yard plus a genuine double garage with remote entry and internal access.
Located amongst other quality built homes in close proximity to Shooing centre, walking distance to local parks & playgrounds and proposed train station.
This exciting property needs to be inspected to be truly appreciated.
You don't want to miss this beautiful opportunity so please call Vipin on 0452 510 707 or Praveen on 0451 419 996 to book and appointment.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
Feel At Home With This Grand Design.
(1P2942) Located in one of the most sought after estates of Clyde is this grand in design and quality built family home by Henley. Only a stone throw away from parks, and a short drive to several schools and shops in this wonderful forever developing area.
Look no further as this home has it all and is sure to tick all of your boxes. With just some of its features listed below;
- 651m2 block.
- 29sq 4 bedroom family home with ducted reverse cycle heating & cooling.
- Master with full ensuite, plus His & Hers WIR's.
- Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all with BIR's.
- Main bathroom plus powder room.
- Well-appointed hostess style kitchen with stone benchtops & quality s/steel appliances.
- 3 zoned living areas comprising of family room, rumpus & kids retreat/office.
- Large alfresco dining area that opens up to a true family backyard, big enough to play a little cricket in or kick the footy.
If you have been looking for your new family home, one that is on a large block, in a great area Than look no further, as this property is everything you have been looking for!
To truly appreciate what this great home has to offer an inspection is a must. So be quick, with genuine sellers this one is sure not to last long.
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.

Description:
Park-facing entertainer
This captivating home directly opposite the Eliston Elm Park is sure to keep the kids busy featuring a playground and half basketball court that even Lebron James would be jealous of. This home, itself a statement, boasts:
- 4 Impressive bedrooms, 3 floor to ceiling tiled bathrooms
- Designer kitchen with stone benchtops and park facing study.
- 2 Separate living zones including theatre room.
- 8 Security Cameras & alarm system with two video intercoms.
Double glazed windows, acoustic insulation, 5.1 sound system, downlight dimmers, soft close drawers and a timber pivot front entry door complete this incredible offering. While being close to quality schools, shops and transport, this one is sure to impress.

Description:
Potential 26 lot Clyde South PSP
Alex Scott & Staff are pleased to present this prime development opportunity. Currently zoned Urban Growth Zone and located within the Clyde South PSP. Four spacious bedrooms with WIR and ensuite in the main bedroom, Open plan living, family and dining area with contemporary kitchen, Large machinery shed (15 foot high, 20 foot wide, 34 foot long) and 3 phase power, Fully fenced, 4 car garage ideal for Caravan or Boat, 5kw solar system with two inverters and Refrigerated cooling.
Key features include:
- 1.3km to proposed Ballarto Road Major Town Centre and shopping precinct
- 1.2km to proposed Clyde Train Station
- 1.21 Hectares or 2.99 Acres
- Potential yield once PSP is approved 26 lots (subject to VPA)

Description:
Brand new Henley Home!!
Located in the popular hartleigh Estate and built by reputed Henley, this stunning Brand New home delivers a fully-optioned environment of style and sophistication perfect for all first home buyers and investors alike.
Comprising a Master bedroom to the front of the house with large walk-in-robe & ensuite with double vanity. Three more bedrooms with built-in-robes, a classy main bathroom, a separate theatre room. Cook up a storm with your fully equipped designer kitchen, with European Stainless steel appliances, Caesar-Stone grand island bench top, Butler's pantry, adjoining open-plan dining & family room.
Extras Include:
Designer kitchen with Caesar-Stone grand island bench
Large 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
Timber look flooring to Hallway, Dining, living and kitchen.
Carpets to bedrooms
Ducted heating
Contemporary front landscaping
Driveway, path and fencing
Remote control Double garage
6 Star Energy rating (double glazed windows)
Double lockup grange with internal access
Pictures are for illustration purposes only and seeing this home will make you fall in love with it.
Ideal location of this home gives you access to
- Multiple Parks
- Future railway station (Clyde) & Cranbourne Railway station
- Selandra rise shopping center
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Selandra rise primary
- Clyde shopping town
- Clyde Tennis Club
- Kingswim & YMCA
- Cranbourne Library
- Casey Fields sporting grounds

Description:
Invest or First home you choose
Located in the tranquil Belmond on Clyde estate, we are proud to introduce this quality home. This 12 month old Metricon built home is sure to impress the most particular of buyers.
Features include:
- Generous master suite with a walk in robe plus ensuite.
- Large open plan family living area with central kitchen and dining space.
- Kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and stone benchtops.
- Outdoor entertaining.
- Other features include ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, upgraded quality fittings to both the kitchen and showers & landscaped gardens.
On top of the great features, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities it's got it all!
To ensure you don't miss out on this amazing opportunity please make sure you contact me to arrange an inspection!

Description:
NORTH FACING, 16 X 32, TITLED BLOCK & EDGEBROOK ESTATE...
CLYDE: Edgebrook Estate: If you are looking for a good sized land block to build the house of your dreams, you need to look no further.
This massive Titled Land block 512sqm (16 X 32) is located in the most spectacular and sought after Edgebrook estate in Clyde.
Not just the size, but the positioning of the land will also impress you. It's a NORTH
facing block with a beautiful 16 metre frontage, which translates into maximum sunlight warming up your living areas and back yard! And light is life!!
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days.
The land block is located very conveniently close to good schools, colleges and the Casey Fields sporting facility, which is a major attraction for the whole of Casey! No facility too far as you are surrounded by the like of The Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Shopping on Clyde
Schools:
St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School
St Peter's College, Clyde North Campus
Clyde Primary School
When it comes to public transport, the block isn't far from the Cranbourne train station, Merinda Park train station or the Berwick train station.
It's hard to find that big a land block at that great a location. So hurry and help Hardeep Singh make it yours! Call 0406676197
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Elegance is an Understatement
*SOLD IN FIRST WEEK*
"Link for property video also attached"
Located in the much sought after "Edgebrook Estate", this gorgeous custom SBG built home is certain to surpass all expectations! Properties like this are a true rarity. This home oozes pure elegance, luxury and style and has been built to the highest level of quality and standards.
The home begins with an extra-large doorway that's sure to impress upon entry. The floor plan begins with a large master suite, which includes a walk-in robe, ensuite with double vanities and wall to wall tiles! The home also has two large living spaces, including a fully enclosed theatre/rumpus room.
But if that doesn't impress you, then the kitchen in this home most certainly will, with stone benchtops, 900mm oven, wall oven, dishwasher, glass splashback, soft closing glossy cupboards/drawers, butlers pantry, double under-mount sink - just to name a few! With a kitchen like this, you couldn't ask for more!
Some of the added premium extras in this home include:
-Study/office
-Powder room
-Large alfresco leading to the massive backyard
-Premium laminate flooring
- High ceilings
- Downlights
- Stone bench tops throughout - kitchen, pantry, laundry, bathroom and ensuite
- Skylights in Study
- Exposed aggregate
- Stacker door & Water feature
- Refrigerated cooling & heating system
- Built-in robes to all bedrooms
Not only does this gorgeous home offer ample living space, and storage capacity but it also offers a great location. Short proximity to Casey Fields, Wallandra Primary School, Casey Grammar School, Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary School, Chisholm Tafe Cranbourne, Casey Race, Selandra Rise, Clyde, Hunt Club Shopping Centre and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centres
Don't miss this great opportunity , contact us now

Description:
Effortless Luxury!
This beautiful Porter Davis built townhouse is positioned right across from shops and amenities in the sought after and brilliant Pasadena estate.
The unrivalled 22 squares (approx.) home features four spacious bedrooms, including a master bedroom suite complete with a walk-in robe and ensuite with dual sinks. All secondary bedrooms are equipped with built in robes.
The ground floor features a powder room, storage space underneath the staircase, and a generously sized separate dining and family zone.
Also featuring the sleek galley styled kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and walk in pantry.
Other remarkable features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 3 toilets, all bathrooms are inclusive of tiles to ceiling, low maintenance backyard that features a concreted patio area and much much more.
INVEST SMART with the advantage of the property currently on a periodic MONTH to MONTH tenancy of $1733.00 per calendar month.
This one cant be missed!

Description:
** UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT **
HARTLEIGH ESTATE, CLYDE: Unless you want to wait for a block to title and then go through the time consuming building process, a near new home in a well established street, like 4 Cavendish Avenue, gives you the opportunity to skip the stress and simply move in and enjoy.
Built by Porter Davis to their usual high standards, this gem has been designed with care free living at its core. Ideal for a young family looking to put down some roots and begin a bright future in this popular up and coming development, investors and empty nesters should also take note.
Fronted by a rendered facade with a deep front portico it certainly has impressive street appeal. As you step inside you will be instantly taken back by the flawless presentation on offer.
Features include a spacious lounge/dining room that joins the galley style kitchen with marble look stone benchtops, stainless appliances that include a 900mm oven/stove plus a walk in pantry. There are 3 genuine bedrooms, the master complete with an ensuite that links directly to the walk in wardrobe. The remaining bedrooms are in close proximity to the stylish family bathroom with separate toilet facilities. Don't forget the study nook, high ceilings, security doors and the soft closing cabinetry.
Ducted heating is essential for a Melbourne winter, 2 powerful split system air-conditioners will provide convenient summer relief. The solar panel system is sure to help keep the bills in check, whilst outside the single garage offers a remote door and bonus internal access. One of the main selling features has to be the oversized backyard that is completely maintenance free thanks to the use of artificial turf.
In an estate lined with parks and walkways, the property is within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. This outstanding opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants!
Offering fantastic value for money this is bound to be snapped up quickly. Call before it's SELLING, SELLING, SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Please note:
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
All of the property details noted were current at the time of publishing. Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.

Description:
The Affordable Dream Home!
Located in Eliston Estate designed to promote a healthy lifestyle and close to Shopping on Clyde and Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, you wont need to look further than this stunning brand new double-storey, family home which exudes luxury and comfort with a modern feel and neutral tones throughout. Besides the striking facade, on offer is four great sized bedrooms, three bathrooms and three separate and spacious living zones. All four bedrooms are located on the first floor with a huge master bedroom including stone-benchtop, double vanity ensuite and walk-in-robe. The remaining three bedrooms all share a central main bathroom with a third fully equipped bathroom downstairs servicing the ground level. Downstairs youll find a cosy theatre/rumpus room, the perfect place to be on cold days which flows out to the immaculate modern kitchen featuring oversized white stone bench tops and timber-look cupboards the perfect contrast, you cant go wrong! Glass 900mm gas cooktop and oven; and big walk-in-pantry make this home a breeze to live in. Enjoy the open-plan meals and living area which allows easy access to the under-cover outdoor alfresco, the perfect place for entertaining all year round. Extras include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, remote control double garage with rear roller access.
Contact Brix Cai on 0433 925 529 for inspection and more information.

Description:
THE DREAM DESTINATION!
Clyde, The Elliston Estate: Clyde, Victoria's fastest growing suburb, is the dream destination for one and all. And in this very posh and flaunt-able area is this brand new family home which is the epitome of quality lifestyle!
This prestigious Rawdon Hill built home is fit for the luxury seeker in you. 4 very generous sized bedrooms, Master with full ensuite and WIR and a central bathroom for the others.
Family living at its best with a family and meals area plus a theatre room. The interiors of the property boast of the best of range fittings and fixtures, superior quality materials and aesthetically laid out floorplan.
List of features is a long one:
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master with Ensuite & WIR
- Formal Lounge/ Theatre Room
- Ultra Modern Kitchen (Stone Bench Tops, Dishwasher, Stainless Steel Appliances)
- Timber Flooring
- High Ceilings
- Blinds
- Double Car Garage with Remote
- Alfresco
- Landscaped Garden/Fencing
- Ducted Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes (Air Conditioner)
- LED Down Lights: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days.
This lovely property is also centrally located, at a stone's throw from a lot of amenities:
- Clyde Primary School
- St Thomas The Apostle Catholic Primary School
- St Peters College - Clyde North
- Lighthouse Christian College Cranbourne
- Public Transport
- Parks, Reserves and water features.
Opportunity that awaits you, give your Area Specialist Hardeep Singh a call on 0406 676 197 now to book an inspection time.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Brand New Luxurious Family Living! MOVE IN SOON.
You will love to come home to this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Backyard area. You will not only be investing in this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design.
The kitchen becomes the masterpiece of the home, a with stainless steel cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops and ample storage space for a modern family, on top of all if that your life is made much easier with a walk in pantry with heaps of space and more to spare!
This home is brimming with features, including:
Four bedrooms, all with built in robes plus the third bedroom that comes with double doors so can be used as a theater.
Master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, stone benchtop, and large shower
Two separate living areas conveniently positioned around the home include a middle formal living, family room adjacent to kitchen and dining.
Modern kitchen features a 40mm caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker and oven, dishwasher, clear glass splashback, and walk-in-pantry
Zoned ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout living areas
Front contemporary Landscaping, fencing and driveways all included !! (conditions apply)
Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
Built by the award-winning Simon Homes, this masterpiece is a rare opportunity to own a piece of the Edgebrook estate, no need to hassle with builders when you can walk right into your very own brand new home.
CALL NOW TO BOOK YOUR OWN APPOINTMENT!!
*Please note images are for illustration purposes only*

Description:
Brand New Metricon Build!
Clyde - 10 & 12 Mississippi Avenue are newly built and ready for you to move in, with the added benefit of First Home Owner Grant eligibility.
Designed to standout with exceptional finishes, light filled open plan living areas and a layout which is liveable for the whole family.
The well proportioned kitchen is certainly at the heart of the home and features stone bench tops, overhead cabinets, and European appliances. The kitchen overlooks the dining and living areas for seamless entertaining, and the alfresco provides the opportunity to flow outside when the weather is beautiful. The landscaped gardens are easy to care for, so there won't be too much maintenance required!
This stunning home offers a second living area complete with a cosy study nook, giving you the option of spreading out in the home or a retreat for unwinding after a busy day.
The master bedroom is equipped with a walk in robe and full private ensuite, with full windows for plenty of natural light. The remaining 3 bedrooms are good in size and feature mirrored sliding built in robes. The family bathroom is equipped with a separate shower and bath and has quality tiles throughout.
There is plenty of room for everyone at 10 & 12 Mississippi Avenue the only thing you need to do now is come and inspect this property yourself!
Features include:
- Stone bench tops
- Floating floorboards
- Master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Alfresco
- Easy to care landscaped front and rear gardens
- Double garage with internal access
- Separate laundry
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS
